subject: Sales
title: Inbound Selling
description: A quick win: understand Inbound Selling.

hook.text: A buyer reads your blog, downloads a guide, and books a demo. They're half-sold before you speak.

buildup.text: Inbound selling aligns with how modern buyers research. Content attracts; sellers guide the final step.

discovery.text: HubSpot popularized the approach. The method follows the buying journey: attract, engage, delight.

twist.text: Inbound demands patience. It takes months to build content that generates consistent qualified leads.

climax.text: Invest in content that educates. Inbound leads close faster because trust exists before the first call.

punchline.text: Attract first. Sell to buyers who already trust you.

quiz.question: Why do inbound leads typically close at higher rates?
options: Trust is built before the first sales conversation
